abstract: Queen Elizabeth II, keeping with tradition, reads outline of Prime Min David Cameron's legislative goals at State Opening of Parliament in Great Britain; list by Cameron, who won unexpected parliamentary majority, includes referendum on membership in European Union, measures to curb immigration and granting of greater authority to security services monitoring terrorism.
lead_paragraph: The British prime minister addressed issues including a referendum on European Union membership and a measure seeking to curb immigration.

headline.main: David Cameron Sets Course for Britain Amid Pageantry of Queen’s Speech
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Britain: Speech by Queen Outlines Cameron’s Agenda for New Term

snippet: The British prime minister addressed issues including a referendum on European Union membership and a measure seeking to curb immigration.

keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
keywords.name: persons
